[source, python]
----
resp = client.search(
    index="products",
    aggs={
        "genres_and_products": {
            "multi_terms": {
                "terms": [
                    {
                        "field": "genre"
                    },
                    {
                        "field": "product"
                    }
                ],
                "order": {
                    "total_quantity": "desc"
                }
            },
            "aggs": {
                "total_quantity": {
                    "sum": {
                        "field": "quantity"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
